imdb.title: Jyu oh sei
imdb.plot: Thor and his younger brother Rai get sent to a planet for the worst criminals in the Bulken system, where they must survive to see the future of their life

episodes.title: Fate
episodes.plot: Thoughts of escaping from Chimaera for the moment put aside, Thor faces an even more daunting challenge. Manipulated into a Try - a duel to the death - with the Ochre Ring's Top, one can't help but question Third's guiding hand in the events playing out.

episodes.title: Ochre Ring
episodes.plot: Thor wakes up to harsh reality where, despite Rai's demise, he is not without companion.

episodes.title: Allies
episodes.plot: With Tiz by his side, Thor heads out into the hostile wilderness in search of answers. There is a hermit, a convict, knowledgeable in the lore of the outside worlds. But there are others on the hunt as well. Crossing paths with Chen, the Sun Ring's Top demands her Second's return, threatening death when Tiz refuses. While a distraction allows for their temporary escape, Thor must face off in a formal duel for his newfound companion's freedom. And Third? He's following along because things are just getting interesting.

episodes.title: Challenge
episodes.plot: It's a day for revelations. Heading out once more in search of answers, Thor cannot trust Third's motivation behind joining their new ring. It seems he's not the only person paying special attention to this ranking member of the Ochre Ring.

episodes.title: Duel
episodes.plot: Thoughts of escaping from Chimaera for the moment put aside, Thor faces an even more daunting challenge.

episodes.title: Blanc Law
episodes.plot: Many years have passed since Thor first arrived on the hostile planet, years in which the boy has grown up into the formidable Top of the Ochre Ring. Older and wiser, the young man still dreams of one day becoming the Beast King and escaping his ill-deserved fate.

episodes.title: Independence
episodes.plot: Beckoned out into the night to meet with Blanc Ro, who is none other than Zagi from the past, Thor is confronted with devastating truth.

episodes.title: Depths
episodes.plot: Trapped in the depths of Chimaera, Thor finds himself attacked by the one he set out to save. As both Third and Tiz set out in search of their Top, Karim's rage turns into something else completely.

episodes.title: Beast King
episodes.plot: Emotions run rampant as Zagi's games seem without end, wreaking havoc in the hearts of those around him.

episodes.title: Nightmare
episodes.plot: Thor arrives at the threshold of all that he has struggled for since being stranded on Chimaera. Prime Minister Odin stands on the other side.

episodes.title: Hope
episodes.plot: One by one lifelong dreams are shattered by reality, dreams which had prompted results both good and bad.
